original: Zeilon, Per Erik, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 21/3/85 i Arboga av rekto^ Jakob Persson o. Emmy Zeilon. G. 32 m. Brita Hejdeman. — Mog:ex. v, norra latin i Sthlm 04, fil. kand. i Upps. 08, provår v. Gbgs h. real 12. Vik. adj. i Skara 09-11, vik. lektor v. Gbgs h. real vt. 13, e. lär. där 13-19, adj. i Östersund 18-36, vik. lektor där ht 33-vt 36, adj. i eng. o. franska v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 36. Res. t. Tyskl., Ital., Schweiz o. Frankr. Övers. Infernosångerna I-XIX ur Dantes La Divina Commedia (23-32).
translated: Zeilon, Per Erik, assistant teacher, Gothenburg, b. 21/3/85 in Arboga, son of principal Jakob Persson and Emmy Zeilon. Married in 1932 to Brita Hejdeman. — Completed secondary school, Norra latin in Stockholm, in 1904. Obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in Uppsala in 1908. Completed internship at Gothenburg's higher secondary school of sciences in 1912. Substitute teacher in Skara from 1909 to 1911, substitute lecturer at Gothenburg's higher secondary school of sciences in the spring of 1913. Primary teacher there from 1913 to 1919, assistant teacher in Östersund from 1918 to 1936. Substitute lecturer there from autumn 1933 to spring 1936, teacher of English and French at Vasa higher elementary school in Gothenburg since 1936. Traveled to Germany, Italy, Switzerland, and France. Translated Inferno songs I-XIX from Dante's La Divina Commedia (1923-1932).
